title: Know Your Road
description: A web app that lets users scan QR codes on roads to instantly view details like project cost, contractors, and officials involved. I am leading this project, and it's currently a work in progress.

title: AI-Powered Chat Application
description: Built with React, Nhost authentication, and real-time GraphQL subscriptions. Features secure user messaging integrated with OpenRouter AI through n8n workflows.

title: Bloggle - Blogging Platform
description: A full-stack blogging platform with user authentication, post creation, editing, and commenting features and user dashboard. Developed using the MERN stack, I handled both frontend integration and backend logic.
